concept.title: Salesforce Header Attributes
concept.shortdesc: The Salesforce origin generates Salesforce record header attributes that provide additional information about each record, such as the source objects for the record. The origin receives these details from Salesforce.

conbody.p: Salesforce originSalesforce header attributesSalesforce header attributesSalesforce originYou can use the record:attribute or record:attributeOrDefault functions to access the information in the attribute.
The Salesforce origin can provide the following Salesforce header attributes:

row.entry:
Provides the Salesforce source object for the record.
Generated when the origin executes a query or subscribes to notifications.

Provides the date that the Salesforce PushTopic encountered the change event.
Generated when the origin subscribes to notifications.

Provides the type of change that the Salesforce PushTopic encountered - created, updated, deleted, or undeleted.
Generated when the origin subscribes to notifications.
